title: Oil Extends Gain as US Seizure of Venezuelan Tanker Adds to Risk
description: Oil extended gains after the US seized a sanctioned tanker off Venezuela, deterring more shipments from the South American producer and raising the risk of a conflict.
content: Oil extended gains after the US seized a sanctioned tanker off Venezuela, deterring more shipments from the South American producer and raising the risk of a conflict.
